page.title: 01NW Paisley and Linwood
page.content: This mixed area can be subdivided:- {(i) NW Paisley}:this area contains major council housing schemes eg. {Ferguslie Park},a notable area of {multiple deprivation},an industrial belt along the railway lines, an area of shops and public buildings in central{Paisley}and large villas in the Castlehead area.Large areas of derelict land dot the industrial landscape, including the site of the demolished{Ferguslie thread mills}. {(ii)}a broad stretch of fertile farmland. {(iii)}the town of{Linwood}and the adjoining massive {Chrysler car {factory},closed in 1981. Linwood was built to house the factory workers. {Unemployment}dogs the area but tenement renovation and the building of a new industrial estate at{Mossedge offer hope for the future.
